message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value and the demand I'm seeing, I'm asking for $15,000. I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
I appreciate the enthusiasm, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $10,000 is significantly below its true value.  How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?  This is a fair price considering the benefits it offers.
I appreciate the compromise, but $13,000 is still a bit too high for me. How about we meet at $11,000? I'm willing to pay a premium, but I need to stay within my budget.
